document.full_text: syrian forces killed at least 11 civilians and wounded scores sunday, a prominent human rights campaigner said, in a widening military push into central syria to quell protests against the rule of president bashar al-assad.
document.title: eleven killed in wider syria military push: lawyer
lines_and_colors: syrian forces killed at least 11 civilians and wounded scores sunday, a prominent human rights campaigner said, in a widening military push into central syria to quell protests against the rule of president bashar al-assad.
